## LinkClickEvent interface

A Link Click Event Used when a user clicks on a link on a webpage, typically an anchor tag <a>

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface LinkClickEvent 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [elementClasses?](./node-tracker.linkclickevent.elementclasses.md) | Array&lt;string&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An array of class names from the element clicked |
|  [elementContent?](./node-tracker.linkclickevent.elementcontent.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The content of the element if present and enabled |
|  [elementId?](./node-tracker.linkclickevent.elementid.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The ID of the element clicked if present |
|  [elementTarget?](./node-tracker.linkclickevent.elementtarget.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The target value of the element if present |
|  [targetUrl](./node-tracker.linkclickevent.targeturl.md) | string | The target URL of the link |
